Text: Thanks bro! I was waitin' for RELOADED release...+1

@adighraiz : Yes, judging from telltales site this is season finale. And judging from the torrent size, it include all previous ones.

Looks like all 5 episodes, judging by the file size.
No need to mention that in the notes, of course, just label it episode 5 when it's in fact ALL EPISODES.
And what's worse, a gazillion people too lazy or stupid or both, will not read earlier posts and will now brainlessly ask if it's all episodes or just 5.

About me saying it doesn't work on Win8, there's a DLL file missing from the install

"dinput8.dll"

If you find that online, place that in your install directory and the game starts.
Yes this one got all episodes :)
